A. I start from a high-rise building, descend to street level, and move toward the parking lot entrance.  
B. I start over the city, descend to a group of high-rise buildings, focus on one of the buildings, and then move to my current location close to the street.  
C. I start from the park, fly toward the street, then fly to the community entrance, and then move to my current position in front of the store.  
D. I fly over the community and descend to my current location near the street in front of the parking lot entrance.  
E. I start from the scooter lane in the park, turn left to face the street outside the park, rise to the height of the high-rise building across the street, move forward to the top of the high-rise building at my current location outside the edge, and then descend to the "Jiuyuan Tobacco and Liquor Shop," my current location in front of the store.
